comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Another of the witnesses called before the Commission on Industrial Relations (Walsh Commission) for their January, 1915 hearings at New York's City Hall. This is John Hays Hammond, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hays_Hammond , "mining engineer, diplomat, and philanthropist." He testified on January 29th. Testimony at: www.archive.org/stream/industrialrelati08unitrich#page/79...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
artolog:

Thanks for the information on Mr. Hammond. We will add to this record as well.
